name: PixelBrawl
description:
PixelBrawl is a competitive game for 2 to 4 local player.

Battle againts each other with swords an traps to se how can collect the most points before the timer runs out.

PixelBrawl was made for playing on a controller but a keyborad can be used but its not the recomended way to play

If you would like to give some feedback go here (portuguese) PixelBrawl Feedback
